most_active_tickets.title: PiecesOS takes a while to boot-up(cannot run): (Unable to make it past ensure core dependency in the Desktop application)

common_issues.title: Pieces OS Fails to Boot After Update
common_issues.description: Users report Pieces OS failing to start after attempting to update to a newer version. The issue seems to occur on both macOS and Windows, with users getting stuck on "ensuring core dependencies." A potential workaround involves further troubleshooting steps like checking logs and system compatibility.

related_issues.title: PiecesOS takes a while to boot-up(cannot run): (Unable to make it past ensure core dependency in the Desktop application)
related_issues.text:
PiecesOS takes a while to boot-up(cannot run): (Unable to make it past ensure core dependency in the Desktop application)
### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

3.3.5

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I got a popup that there was a new version of Pieces OS and that I needed to click and restart to update. But now the desktop app won't start anymore, being stuck on the core dependencies.

I can click on the link, but nothing changes when I do that.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/716af38b-6a71-4162-80f8-b9e9e44f7059)
## Conversation Summary: Pieces OS support issue

**Key points raised:**

* The issue is occurring on Windows.
* The user is seeing a HandshakeException error message.
* The user has provided logs of the issue.
* The Pieces OS team is investigating the issue and has asked for additional information from the user.

**Problems identified:**

* HandshakeException error message.
* The issue may be related to the user's location or outdated CPU.
* The user is unable to speak English fluently.

**Solutions proposed/implemented:**

* The Pieces OS team has requested additional information from the user to help diagnose the issue.
* The user has provided the requested information.
* The Pieces OS team is investigating the issue and will provide a solution as soon as possible.

**Current status/outcome:**

* The issue is still under investigation.

## Additional Information:

* The issue seems to be specific to Windows, as the conversation has diverted to troubleshooting steps for that operating system.
* The user has confirmed that the issue was not present on a previous day, suggesting a recent change may be the cause.
* The user has provided screenshots of their file structure, which may be helpful in diagnosing the issue.

## Next Steps:

* The Pieces OS team will continue to investigate the issue and provide a solution as soon as possible.
* The user should monitor the issue and provide any additional information that may be helpful in diagnosing the problem.

recommendations: Investigate and resolve the "Pieces OS Fails to Boot After Update" issue, as it affects both macOS and Windows users and prevents them from using the application.
Provide clearer instructions or troubleshooting steps for users experiencing issues with core dependencies during the update process.
Consider prioritizing bug fixes related to application updates, as they can significantly impact user experience and lead to increased support tickets.
Monitor the effectiveness of any implemented solutions by tracking the number of new tickets related to the "Pieces OS Fails to Boot After Update" issue and core dependency errors.
Gather more data on the specific causes of the boot failure, such as system configurations, log files, and error messages, to better understand and address the root cause.
Improve communication with users by providing updates on the status of the investigation and any estimated timelines for a resolution.
Develop automated tests to catch similar issues in the future and prevent them from reaching production.
